Enhanced data storage efficiency with bulk insert functionality, reducing processing time by 60%.‚Ä¢ Deployed GeoJSON and MapboxGL in the final stage of the pipeline to create advanced visualizations on interactivemaps"},{"title":"Anomaly detection machine learning model","start_date":"Jan 2023","end_date":"Aug 2023","description":"‚Ä¢ Engineered a robust machine learning algorithm for pipeline anomaly detection, leveraging Support Vector Machine techniques; delivered a solution that flagged anomalies 25% faster than previous methods, enhancing response times.‚Ä¢ Attained a 95.93 % accuracy rate in a anomaly detection project by employing advanced machine learning algorithms.‚Ä¢ Spearheaded collaboration with cross-functional teams to define system requirements, resulting in the design of a scalablesoftware architecture that increased user capacity handling by 50% during peak traffic periods.‚Ä¢ Spearheaded the design and development of an event website utilizing React JS and Node.js; optimized both front-endand back-end functionalities, resulting in over 3,000 user registrations and enhanced site performance.‚Ä¢ Executed rigorous test protocols that enhanced software quality, resulting in a 40% reduction in post-release defects;managed critical data to streamline operations, ensuring departmental efficiency and continuous improvement."},{"title":"Multi-Vendor Restaurant Marketplace","description":"‚Ä¢ Implemented a robust multi-vendor marketplace platform using Django and Bootstrap, ensuring a mobile-friendly webapplication. Optimized geography datastorage in PostgreSQL with PostGIS, enhancing performance and data integrity.‚Ä¢ Engineered a tailored Django middleware solution to facilitate seamless account management; integrated real-time dataupdates using Ajax, resulting in a 30% improvement in application efficiency and user satisfaction scores.‚Ä¢ Integrated PayPal for secure online transactions and refined CDTFA API to retrieve local tax rates, ensuring accurate"},{"title":"Shopping List App","description":"Designed a user-friendly shopping list app using React Native and Firebase to streamline list management‚Ä¢ Established a complete CoreData architecture to optimize app data processing, resulting in 15% faster load times and abetter user journey, improving user retention.."},{"title":"Text Summarization","description":"Executed a user centric extension that consolidated feedback from 450+ users, creating concise summaries thatfacilitated data-driven decisions, ultimately increasing user retention rates by 10% over six months.‚Ä¢ Streamlined a cutting-edge algorithm for textual information processing, achieving an 80% accuracy rate thisperformance led to a 50% increase in user satisfaction ratings based on feedback surveys."}]
